member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarDatabase
member.summary: The CalendarDatabase provides methods to manage calendar information from/to the database.
member.remarks: This class allows user to access/create/update/delete database operations for the calendar information. The CalendarDatabase is created by the CalendarManager.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarRecord
member.summary: A record represents an actual record in the database.
member.remarks: A record represents an actual record in the database, but you can also consider it a piece of information, such as an alarm, attendee, and extended. A record can be a complex set of data, containing other data. For example, a calendar record contains the alarm property, which is a reference to an alarm record. An alarm record could belong to a event record, and its alarm ID property is set to the identifier of the corresponding event. In this case, the alarm is the child record of the event, and the event is the parent record.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes
member.summary: This class provides enumerations about the calendar information.
member.remarks: Most enumerations are based on vCalendar and iCalendar(ver 2.0) specification. https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2445.txt

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.BookMode.Default
member.summary: All modules can read and write records of this calendar book.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.BookMode.ReadOnly
member.summary: All modules can only read records of this calendar book.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.Priority
member.summary: Enumeration for the calendar event item's priority.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.Recurrence
member.summary: Enumeration for the frequency of an event's recurrence.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.Recurrence.Weekly
member.summary: An event occurs on the same day of every week. According to the week flag, the event will recur every day of the week.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.Recurrence.Monthly
member.summary: An event occurs on the same day of every month.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.Recurrence.Yearly
member.summary: An event occurs on the same day of every year.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.TickUnit
member.summary: Enumeration for the alarm time unit type of an event, such as minutes, hours, days, and so on.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarTypes.Cutype
member.summary: Enumeration to specify the type of calendar user, specified by the property.

member.summary: Database record ID of the calendar book.

member.summary: Visibility of the calendar book for UX.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Book.StoreType
member.summary: Type of calendar contents (refer to the CalendarTypes.StoreType).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Book.SyncData1
member.summary: Generic data for use by syncing.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Book.SyncData2
member.summary: Generic data for use by syncing.

member.summary: Generic data for use by syncing.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Book.Mode
member.summary: Calendar book mode (refer to the CalendarTypes.BookMode).

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event
member.summary: Describes the properties of a Event record.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Id
member.summary: Database record ID of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.BookId
member.summary: ID of the calendar book to which the event belongs.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Summary
member.summary: The short description of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Categories
member.summary: The category of the event. For example, appointment, birthday.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Exdate
member.summary: The exception list of the event. If this event has a recurrence rule, the instance of the exdate is removed. Format is "YYYYMMDD"(allday event) or "YYYYMMDDTHHMMSS". Multiple exceptions can be included with a comma.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.EventStatus
member.summary: The status of event (refer to the CalendarTypes.EventStatus).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Priority
member.summary: The priority of event (refer to the CalendarTypes.Priority).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Timezone
member.summary: The timezone_id of the event, if it exists.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.ContactId
member.summary: The person_id of the event if the event is a birthday. Refer to the contacts-service.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.BusyStatus
member.summary: The busy status of event (refer to the CalendarTypes.BusyStatus).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Sensitivity
member.summary: The sensitivity of event (refer to the CalendarTypes.Sensitivity).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Uid
member.summary: The unique ID of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.OrganizerName
member.summary: The name of organizer of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.OrganizerEmail
member.summary: The email address of the organizer of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.MeetingStatus
member.summary: The meeting status of event (refer to the CalendarTypes.MeetingStatus).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.OriginalEventId
member.summary: The ID of the original event, if the event is an exception.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Latitude
member.summary: The latitude of the location of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Longitude
member.summary: The longitude of the location of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.EmailId
member.summary: ID of the email_id. Refer to the email-service.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.CreatedTime
member.summary: The time when the event is created.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.LastModifiedTime
member.summary: The time when the event is updated.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.IsDeleted
member.summary: Whether or not the event is deleted.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Freq
member.summary: The frequent type of event recurrence (refer to the CalendarTypes.Recurrence).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.RangeType
member.summary: The range type of event recurrence (refer to the CalendarTypes.RangeType).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Until
member.summary: The end time of the event recurrence. Only if this is used with RangeType.Until.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Count
member.summary: The count of the event recurrence. Only if this is used with RangeType.Count.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Interval
member.summary: The interval of the event recurrence.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Bysecond
member.summary: The second list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 0 to 59. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Byminute
member.summary: The minute list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 0 to 59. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Byhour
member.summary: The hour list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 0 to 23. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Byday
member.summary: The day list of the event recurrence. The value can be SU, MO, TU, WE, TH, FR, SA. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Bymonthday
member.summary: The month day list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 1 to 31 and from -31 to -1. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Byyearday
member.summary: The year day list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 1 to 366 and from -366 to -1. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Byweekno
member.summary: The week number list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 1 to 53 and from -53 to -1. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Bymonth
member.summary: The month list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 1 to 12. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Bysetpos
member.summary: The position list of the event recurrence. The value can be from 1 to 366 and from -366 to -1. The list is separated by commas.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Wkst
member.summary: The start day of the week (refer to the CalendarTypes.WeekDay).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.HasAttendee
member.summary: Whether or not the event has an attendee list.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.HasAlarm
member.summary: Whether or not the event has an alarm list.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.SyncData1
member.summary: The sync data of the event. If the developers need to save some information related to the event, they can use this property.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.SyncData2
member.summary: The sync data of the event. If the developers need to save some information related to the event, they can use this property.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.SyncData3
member.summary: The sync data of the event. If the developers need to save some information related to the event, they can use this property.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.SyncData4
member.summary: The sync data of the event. If the developers need to save some information related to the event, they can use this property.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Start
member.summary: The start time of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.End
member.summary: The end time of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Alarm
member.summary: The alarm list of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Attendee
member.summary: The attendee list of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.CalendarSystemType
member.summary: The calendar system type (refer to the CalendarTypes.SystemType).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Exception
member.summary: The exception mod event list of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.Extended
member.summary: The extended property list of the event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Event.IsAllday
member.summary: The event is an allday event or not.

member.summary: The event is an base linked event.

member.name: T:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone
member.summary: Describes the properties of a timezone record.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.Id
member.summary: Database record ID of the timezone.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.TzOffsetFromGmt
member.summary: UTC offset, which is in use when the onset of this time zone observance begins. Valid values are -720(-12:00) to 840(+14:00).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.StdStartMonth
member.summary: Starting month of the standard time. Month is 0-based. For example, 0 for January.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.StdStartPositionOfWeek
member.summary: Starting day-of-week-in-month of the standard time. Day is 1-based.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.StdStartDay
member.summary: Starting day-of-week of the standard time. Valid values are 1 (SUNDAY) to 7 (SATURDAY).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.StdStartHour
member.summary: Starting hour of the standard time. Valid values are 0 to 23.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.StandardBias
member.summary: The number of minutes added during the standard time.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.DayLightStartMonth
member.summary: Starting month of the Daylight. Month is 0-based. For example, 0 for January.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.DayLightStartPositionOfWeek
member.summary: Starting day-of-week-in-month of the Daylight. Day is 1-based.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.DayLightStartDay
member.summary: Starting day-of-week of the Daylight. Valid values are 1 (SUNDAY) to 7 (SATURDAY).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.DayLightStartHour
member.summary: Starting hour of the Daylight. Valid values are 0 to 23.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.DayLightBias
member.summary: The number of minutes added during the Daylight time.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Timezone.CalendarId
member.summary: Database record ID of a related calendar book.

member.summary: Identifier of this calendar attendee view.

member.summary: The email address of the attendee.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Attendee.Rsvp
member.summary: RSVP invitation reply (one of true, false).

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Attendee.Member
member.summary: Group that the attendee belongs to.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Attendee.ParentId
member.summary: Event/TODO that the attendee belongs to.

member.summary: Identifier of this calendar alarm view.

member.summary: The number of unit before start time. This must be used with one of TickUnit.

member.summary: Reminder tick time unit (refer to the CalendarTypes.TickUnit).

member.summary: Event that the alarm belongs to.

member.name: F:Tizen.Pims.Calendar.CalendarViews.Alarm.Action
member.summary: Action of alarm (refer to the CalendarTypes.Action).

member.value: The combination of the reminder data (Value string like id=value&time=value&tick=value&unit=value&type=value).
